title: DC Memory Game
description: DC Memory Game is a browser-based memory matching game where players test their memory by flipping cards to find matching pairs of DC heroes, built with vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

title: I'm hungry
description: Recipe Management App is a full-stack React + Vite single-page application (SPA) for comprehensive recipe management. Users can browse paginated recipe collections, perform full CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete), manage favorites, authenticate with persistent profiles, and navigate seamlessly across 12+ interconnected pages.

title: Harry Potter Student App
description: A React application that allows users to explore, create, edit, and manage Hogwarts students, featuring house filters, a favorites system, and themed pages inspired by the Wizarding World.

title: Harry Potter Student App
description: A React application that allows users to explore, create, edit, and manage Hogwarts students, featuring house filters, a favorites system, and themed pages inspired by the Wizarding World.
